cards.flavor: Once proud monuments, the ruins of ancient ziggurats now serve as humble stops for wandering Knights of the Reliquary.
cards.name: Wayfarer's Shrine
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Shrine: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.flavor:
“And so, with this hardened heart and tired soul, I take this pen to paper to praise the tales of the great, the mighty, and the divine.”
—The Tale of Kings
cards.name: Wayfarer's Shrine
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Shrine: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.flavor:

—Selvar, the Seeker

—Shrine inscription

cards.flavor: “I had heard stories of Custopa and I thought him a fool. Live the life you have, don't throw it away. But only after the war do I see that I was the fool. It took winning to see the value of what he died trying to protect.”
cards.name: Wayfarer's Shrine
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Shrine: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: A brief respite in the darkest of nights.
cards.name: Wayfarer's Shrine
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Shrine: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.flavor:
“I like to think it's called Temple Highpoint not because of its altitude, but because it's the best part of every traveler's journey!”
—Kaone of the Golden Sonata
cards.name: Wayfarer's Shrine
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Shrine: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.flavor:
“Beyond this marker lie foes you cannot prepare for. Fare thee well, traveler.”
—Rune carvings
cards.name: Wayfarer's Shrine
cards.text: {T}, Pay 1 life, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Shrine: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

cards.flavor: In ten seconds flat, one can walk five hundred miles and meet a rainbow of faces, all without having to go outside.

cards.flavor: Where once divided was now aligned, fate and freedom now intertwined.

cards.flavor: The shelter's builder is unknown, but thanked all the same.

cards.flavor: The paths one walks and worries they carry are all forgotten around the fire.

cards.flavor: Critics and rubes, strangers and spies  all hush, marveled at curtain's rise.

cards.flavor: Usona's denizens grew more passive by the day, while the building storm grew ever more furious in turn.

cards.flavor: The most important thing to know in any city is the best places to stop for lunch.

cards.flavor: Penguin colonies wander Duwinda's coasts, maintaining markers to help them find their way.

cards.flavor: “Run faster. Jump higher. Pay up.”
